The photo was published on a specific Fa: 2020, which has been shared nearly 200 times.
The post: s caption explicitly identifies the individuals in the photo as Turkish-German scientist Ugur Sahin and his family, stating that he is the inventor of the Covid-19 vaccine being marketed by Pfizer.
BioNTech: s director of external communications confirmed that the photo is not of Ugur Sahin and his family, and a reverse image search on Google found that the same photo was posted on a Twitter account related to the Turkish community in August 2020, with a different context and description.
